attributes.action: explain why, in a 'democratic' society the outcome of e-petitions are ignored
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Of the e-petitions that have been responded to by the PM I have not yet seen one where the outcome of the petition (ie the will of the people) has been taken seriously but rather the PM has attempted to explain why policy will not be changed.

E-petition signitories respresent as much as 5% of the population and should be taken serioulsly.

rejection.details: Please send any queries to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
